FuncDef: This command displays network queue policy information.

ParaDef.Info: The name of the network queue policy. Values-Valid names consist of any string, up to 32 characters, composed of printable, 7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes..
Includes each queue s rates and adaptation-rule and cbs details. It also shows FC-to-queue mapping details.
